PROGRESS? no such thing
there is only neutral. progress is a cop who drives through stop lights. progress is above the laws of nature. there is only eternal shittyness. if you have money, youre going to lose it. if you dont have money, youre going to win the jackpot, or not, but still be alright. and even if you did win the jackpot, you would just spend it on dumb shit. or save it till you die, and let your shitty kids blow it on dumb shit. there is no moving forward, just the illusion of it. jamiroquai said it best:
TRAVELING WITHOUT MOVING
life is like a bullshit videogame once you beat it, you just wait around till the next video game comes out. its just going through the motions. nothing really matters. its not "everything is nothing, but nothing is something, and everything is the same." the future is bleak my friend. very bleak indeed.
isnt it something like the most colorful insects the ones with the most intricate patterns and vibrant colors are probably the ones that can kill you? something like that right?

if i dont just stay in chicago these are the places i might move: PENNSYLVANIA LOS ANGELES FERNDALE CLARKSTON if i move to any one of these places i am going to disappoint someone: if i move away from chicago, ill disappoint my girlfriend if i move to pennsylvania, ill disappoint my friend josh if i dont move to pennsylvania, ill disappoint my friend mike, if i move to anywhere but ferndale, ill disappoint my friends back home if i move anywhere but clarkston, ill disappoint my mom and pop. if i move period, ill disappoint my current roommates. anywhere i go ill be letting someone down. i wish i could just say fuck everyone else, i got to worry about myself, but then id feel selfish, or something.

what to do...

BEFORE I FORGET
i keep having this same dream where there is a house on a lot in some sort of residential area. the house is up front on the lot, with a separate garage on the back of the lot, with a guest room or something like it on top. i walk through the front house, its real nice. seems like a fancy place. lots of wood and glass. there is no one home, so i walk through to the back yard and into the guest house. every time i go there in the dream, there is something about to catch on fire, whether its a pot on the stove with burning something in it, or a space heater left on about to torch some curtains- and i always put it out before anything happens. strange?

would i be a complete failure if i moved back home? i dont know why it has such a stigma to it. but it does. it would be cool to be home close to all my friends. it would be cool not to pay rent and eat good food at my parents house while i look for a job/new place. it would be cool to try to get in on the film industry growing in detroit... but i still cant get over the nagging feeling that i will feel like a complete chump if i go back. i guess its stupid. about as stupid as a 22 year old on livejournal talking about his "feelings." ANYWAYS im leaving for L.A. today. it will be the first time i have ever made it to the left coast. ill be driving with my friend larkin and his dog aldous. its going to take us 5 days to drive there. its going to be a blast i just hope it all goes smoothly. photos to come...

P I S S H O U S E
in my house there lives two cats one of which regards the entire house as its litter box. once it pissed on my bed. i hear this is pretty common practice for bad cats. im not the cleanest person in the world, but living in a house where there may or may not be cat piss in every corner, on every rug, or any couch cushion at any time is the most revolting thing i can think of (currently). to live in another animals filth is just unacceptable, and my room mate who owns the cat couldnt care less about the situation. i need not mention the fur everywhere or the stench in general, or the myriad of other problems that come with cat ownership. i need to get out of this place. if its the last thing i ever do. dreams of detroit dacing round my dome

WHAT IF WHAT IT WAS NOT WAS WHAT IT WAS?

1: hello? 2: oh, who is this?

1; this is _____, you called me. how are you anyways? i havent talked to you in a long time. 2: im ok, i was just trying to get a hold of my other friend _____, youre the next name down. 1: right - well, i guess youd better give them a call then. 2: yeah, sorry i bothered you. 1: oh no, it was nice to hear from you. talk to you soon [?] 2: sure. alright - goodbye. 1: bye
a handful of drawings i did ranging from summer of 2009 until now. variations using pen, paint marker, and cutout collages

a dog stole my mitten yesterday. this big black pitbull was barking at my friend doug and i. it got snow all over its face as it was trying to get at us through the fence. and of course i was talking like an idiot to it: "oooh pupums... why you so maaad??" go to pet her, and in the simplest motion she just grabbed my mitten right off my hand and casually brought it into her dog house. i was dumbstruck. it was right out of a movie. and i felt pretty stupid. sure taught me a lesson though. yep. in other news, i found this illustration on a book called GENERAL LINGUISTICS or something like that. ive got to use it, dont know for what. oh and im starting a new blog:


KCNIFHSOJ.TUMBLR

screenprint i made based off of a tattoo on some guys face in the frank miller comic HARD BOILED, definitely one of the gnarliest comics ive ever read.
i highly recommend a thorough look at this comic, it baffles me the time and energy that went into making this horrifically awesome book.
CATS ARENT FUNNY MOST ART SUCKS DRUNK PEOPLE ARE ANNOYING

i need to make one of the things in the middle. its called a DIRTY VIDEO SWITCH. its just three RCA plugs, two in one out and a potentiometer (mixing knob) between the two ins. its like five bucks of hardware. it allows you to switch from one video signal to the next with a really harsh, garbled up transition between. its possible to have say four VCRs and three switches,so you could go from video A1 to A2 then B1 to B2, all out of one projector.

essentially, you could make a whole board of multiple dirty video switches, and mess with the between states. so many possibilities... and thats not even talking about the audio coming out of the VCRs... oh my lard.

i dont understand
how some people can disassociate themselves from others so completely and coldly. its bizzare, but you know, i wonder if they are happier people. my friend jason who lives above me put it very plainly to me one night, he basically told me that he could care less about his past girlfriends, and that it wouldnt really matter if they were dead or alive. it wouldnt affect him in the least bit. he seemed pretty definite, but as we kept talking about his most recent girlfriend, it didnt really seem to me like he was over her. i think he just wanted to convince himself that hes a strong willed dude or something. he certainly did not seem happy in any sense of the word. in this book FUTURE SHOCK by alvin toffler, he says that the most successful people are the ones who can completely disassociate themselves with their past contacts that need not be maintained for other than emotional reasons. that its a healthy way of life. i couldnt disagree more really. but i dont know if either way could be considered healthy. is there a point where a friendship becomes a baggage? i guess thats a stupid question. but even so, i dont feel like anyone is baggage to me. if i am to someone else, i wish they would just leave me off. i dont think anyone likes to be a burden, and im no exception. i guess i just feel like im in constant limbo with some people. its probably all in my head. actually i know it is. but i cant shake the feeling. blah blah blah.

this is where i work this is what i look like when i work (i wish that was a sweet huge cape-like collar and not a shadow.)


work is pretty cool. i have been on the computer for about six hours today, designing ads for the local paper and re-doing the menus again & again. and still getting paid! and still eating snacks! yesterday i got a grease burn while dropping falafel into the deep fryer. that sucked pretty bad. luckily it dosnt look gross like most grease burns ive seen do. but at least i got a tasty treat out of it. im kind of glad i havent gotten a serious design job yet. this is good for now. im going to keep looking of course, but the two things im involved in - lumpen and zatune - are on the same side of the street, and within two blocks of eachother. i couldnt really ask for much more at the moment. except maybe a shawarma wrap, which i can make myself in like five minutes. so tight!
